overview: 24 year old Jordan Fox is gonna be your Summer Lover in Chaudes Vacances Avec Jordan Fox. With his perfect body, shining smile and a perfect 8+ inch cock, you won't want anyone else. Join Jordan's holidays when all he plans to do is to have sex in unusual places : in the toilets with a handsome Brazilian, outdoor in the woods with the Belgian Philippe Delvaux; by the sea with Enzo Rimenez, in a sauna and by the swimming pool. You'll wish you met him during your holidays because he is unforgettable.
title: En vacances avec Jordan Fox
